name: bluesky-finder
description: Checks for _atproto DNS TXT records for the current domain and provides a beautiful butterfly indicator for Bluesky presence, if found.

scripts.build:chrome: cp manifest.chrome.json manifest.json && web-ext build -s . -a dist/chrome -i icons/generate-icons.sh -i dist -i manifest.firefox.json -i manifest.chrome.json -i prettier.config.cjs -i package.json -i pnpm-lock.yaml -i README.md -i cspell.json -i LICENSE -n chrome-extension.zip --overwrite-dest && rm manifest.json
scripts.build:firefox: cp manifest.firefox.json manifest.json && web-ext build -s . -a dist/firefox -i icons/generate-icons.sh -i dist -i manifest.firefox.json -i manifest.chrome.json -i prettier.config.cjs -i package.json -i pnpm-lock.yaml -i README.md -i cspell.json -i LICENSE -n firefox-extension.zip --overwrite-dest && rm manifest.json
